            "acceptedAnswer": {
                "@type": "Answer",
                "text": "During re-treatment, the dentist will remove the old filling, clean the canals again, and address the infection. The procedure may involve additional steps, such as sealing the tooth to prevent infection."

            "name": "How soon after re-treatment will I feel relief from symptoms?",

        {

            "name": "How do I prevent root canal infections from recurring?",
            "acceptedAnswer": {
                "@type": "Answer",
                "text": "Maintaining good oral hygiene, avoiding excessive force on treated teeth, and following up with regular dental check-ups can help prevent re-infection and ensure the long-term success of root canal treatments."

											<div class="et_post_meta_wrapper">
							<h1 class="entry-title">Root Canal Infection Years Later</h1>

						<p class="post-meta"> by <span class="author vcard"><a href="https://drjaydevdental.com/author/dr-jaydev-m/" title="Posts by Dr. Jaydev Dental Clinic" rel="author">Dr. Jaydev Dental Clinic</a></span> | <span class="published">Nov 22, 2024</span> | <a href="https://drjaydevdental.com/category/blog/" rel="category tag">Blog</a></p><img src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/bnr.png.webp" alt="" class="" width="1080" height="675" srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/bnr.png.webp 1080w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/bnr-480x270.png.webp 480w" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 1080px, 100vw" />
												</div>
				
					<div class="entry-content">
					<div class="post-views content-post post-106005 entry-meta load-static">
				<span class="post-views-icon dashicons dashicons-chart-bar"></span> <span class="post-views-label">Post Views:</span> <span class="post-views-count">2,209</span>
			</div><div class="et-l et-l--post">
			<div class="et_builder_inner_content et_pb_gutters3">
		<div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_0">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_0  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>A root canal is a dental procedure designed to treat infections or damage within a tooth&#8217;s pulp. This treatment helps preserve the tooth and relieve pain. During the procedure, the dentist removes the infected pulp and seals the tooth to prevent further infection. Although the treatment is generally effective, some patients may experience root canal infection years later in the treated tooth.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Dr. Jaydev M., a prominent <a href="https://drjaydevdental.com/best-dental-specialist-in-hyderabad/">dentist in Hyderabad</a>, notes, “Infection in root canal tooth years later can be concerning, but it’s not rare. When the infection recurs, it could be due to various factors. It’s essential to seek professional treatment if you experience pain or discomfort”.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Dr. Jaydev M is an internationally trained <a href='https://drjaydevdental.com/when-should-i-consider-digital-smile-designing/'>smile design</a> specialist with 15+ years of experience in complex dental cases. He has treated over 50,000 patients and performed over 7,200 <a href="https://drjaydevdental.com/root-canal-treatment-hyderabad/">root canal procedures</a>, focusing on advanced treatments and re-treatments. Dr. Jaydev’s Dental Clinic is recognized for its premium care and modern technology, ensuring exceptional service even in challenging situations.</p></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_1 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_1 et_pb_gutters1">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_3 et_pb_column_1  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_text_align_center-phone et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>Are you worried about a root canal infection years later? Seek expert care for an accurate diagnosis. Book an appointment today!</p></div>
			</div>

			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_3 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_3">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_4  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_heading et_pb_heading_0 et_pb_bg_layout_">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_heading_container"><h2 class="et_pb_module_heading">Understanding Root Canal Infections</h2></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_4">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_5  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>A root canal infection occurs when bacteria enter the tooth&#8217;s pulp, causing inflammation and pain. If the tooth isn’t properly sealed or develops a new crack, bacteria can re-enter, possibly leading to a new infection even years later.</p>
<p>If untreated, this infection can spread to the root tips and surrounding bone, leading to severe pain, swelling, and tooth loss. It is essential to monitor the treated tooth and seek professional help if you experience any discomfort.</p></div>
			</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_6  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_0">
				
				
				
				
				<span class="et_pb_image_wrap "><img decoding="async" width="612" height="408" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20612%20408'%3E%3C/svg%3E" alt="" title="1" data-lazy-srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/1-2.png.webp 612w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/1-2-480x320.png.webp 480w" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 612px, 100vw" class="wp-image-106011" data-lazy-src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/1-2.png.webp" /><noscript><img decoding="async" width="612" height="408" src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/1-2.png.webp" alt="" title="1" srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/1-2.png.webp 612w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/1-2-480x320.png.webp 480w" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 612px, 100vw" class="wp-image-106011" /></noscript></span>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_4 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_5">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_7  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>Have you been wondering if it&#8217;s normal to experience issues with a root canal years later? Let&#8217;s explore the possibility of recurring infections.</p></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_heading et_pb_heading_1 et_pb_bg_layout_">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_heading_container"><h2 class="et_pb_module_heading">Is a Root Canal Infection Years Later Normal?</h2></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>It is uncommon, but root canal infections can occur years later in some cases. Although root canals are designed to eliminate infection and preserve the tooth, no <a href="https://drjaydevdental.com/dental-treatments/">dental procedure</a> offers lifelong protection from complications.</p>
<p>Several factors can lead to infection in root canal years later after the initial treatment. Patients who notice persistent pain, swelling, or sensitivity in the treated tooth should not ignore these signs. Early intervention can help preserve the tooth and prevent further complications.</p>
<p>Dr. Jaydev M. notes, &#8220;A root canal is highly effective, but its success relies on quality care and proper post-treatment maintenance.&#8221; With advancements in dental technology, <a href="https://drjaydevdental.com/re-root-canal-treatment-hyderabad/">re-root canal treatment</a> or other solutions can effectively address these concerns.</p></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_5 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_6 et_pb_gutters1">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_3 et_pb_column_8  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_6  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_text_align_center-phone et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>Are you worried about a root canal infection years later? Seek expert care for an accurate diagnosis. Book an appointment today!</p></div>
			</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_3 et_pb_column_9  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_button_module_wrapper et_pb_button_1_wrapper et_pb_button_alignment_center et_pb_button_alignment_tablet_center et_pb_button_alignment_phone_center et_pb_module ">
				<a class="et_pb_button et_pb_button_1 et_pb_bg_layout_light" href="https://drjaydevdental.com/contact/">Book an Appointment</a>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_6 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_7">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_10  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_7  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>Concerned about the reason behind your root canal infection years later? Here are some factors to consider.</p></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_heading et_pb_heading_2 et_pb_bg_layout_">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_heading_container"><h2 class="et_pb_module_heading">What Causes Root Canal Infection Years Later?</h2></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_1">
				
				
				
				
				<span class="et_pb_image_wrap "><img decoding="async" width="612" height="301" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20612%20301'%3E%3C/svg%3E" alt="" title="22" data-lazy-srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/22-1.png.webp 612w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/22-1-480x236.png.webp 480w" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 612px, 100vw" class="wp-image-106021" data-lazy-src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/22-1.png.webp" /><noscript><img decoding="async" width="612" height="301" src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/22-1.png.webp" alt="" title="22" srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/22-1.png.webp 612w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/22-1-480x236.png.webp 480w" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 612px, 100vw" class="wp-image-106021" /></noscript></span>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_0  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><strong>New Decay</strong><br />
Even if the root canal procedure was initially successful, decay can form around the treated tooth, allowing bacteria to infect the area.</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_1  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Cracks or Fractures</strong><br />If the treated tooth develops a crack or fracture, bacteria can enter the root and cause an infection.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_2  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Improper Sealing</strong><br />Incomplete tooth sealing during the procedure may allow bacteria to re-enter, causing a new infection.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_3  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><strong>Delayed or Incomplete Healing</strong><br />
Sometimes, the healing process takes longer than expected, leading to root canal complications years later.</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_4  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Re-infection from Gum Disease</strong><br />If you experience gum disease or poor oral hygiene, the bacteria can spread to the root canal area and cause reinfection.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_7 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_8">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_11  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_8  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>Let&#8217;s look at the signs that may indicate a recurring infection.</p></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_heading et_pb_heading_3 et_pb_bg_layout_">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_heading_container"><h2 class="et_pb_module_heading">Symptoms of a Root Canal Infection</h2></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_9">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_12  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_5  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Pain or discomfort</strong>: Persistent or recurring pain in the treated tooth is a common symptom.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_6  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Swelling and tenderness</strong>: Swelling around the gum area or jaw can indicate an infection.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_7  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Sensitivity to temperature</strong>: If the tooth becomes sensitive to hot or cold again, it could be a sign of infection.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_13  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_2">
				
				
				
				
				<span class="et_pb_image_wrap "><img decoding="async" width="391" height="280" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20391%20280'%3E%3C/svg%3E" alt="" title="3" data-lazy-srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3.png.webp 391w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3-300x215.png.webp 300w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 391px) 100vw, 391px" class="wp-image-106032" data-lazy-src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3.png.webp" /><noscript><img decoding="async" width="391" height="280" src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3.png.webp" alt="" title="3" srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3.png.webp 391w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3-300x215.png.webp 300w" sizes="(max-width: 391px) 100vw, 391px" class="wp-image-106032" /></noscript></span>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_10">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_14  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_8  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Discoloration</strong>: The treated tooth may become darker over time.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_9  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Pimple-like bump on the gum</strong>: This could indicate the presence of pus from an infected root canal.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_10  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Bad taste or odour</strong>: A foul odour or taste in the mouth may be caused by an infection draining from the tooth.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_8 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_11 et_pb_gutters1">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_2_3 et_pb_column_15  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_9  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_text_align_center-phone et_pb_bg_layout_light">

			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_9 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_12">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_17  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_10  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>Why should you avoid ignoring a recurring root canal infection? Discover the risks of putting off treatment.</p></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_heading et_pb_heading_4 et_pb_bg_layout_">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_heading_container"><h2 class="et_pb_module_heading">Risks of Ignoring a Recurring Infection</h2></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_13">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_18  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_11  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Spread</strong> <strong>of Infection</strong>: The infection can spread to surrounding tissues, leading to more severe dental issues.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_12  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Tooth loss</strong>: If left untreated, an infection can weaken the tooth and ultimately lead to its loss.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_13  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Bone damage</strong>: The infection can spread to the surrounding bone, leading to irreversible damage.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_19  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_3">
				
				
				
				
				<span class="et_pb_image_wrap "><img decoding="async" width="391" height="280" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20391%20280'%3E%3C/svg%3E" alt="" title="3" data-lazy-srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3.png.webp 391w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3-300x215.png.webp 300w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 391px) 100vw, 391px" class="wp-image-106032" data-lazy-src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3.png.webp" /><noscript><img decoding="async" width="391" height="280" src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3.png.webp" alt="" title="3" srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3.png.webp 391w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/3-3-300x215.png.webp 300w" sizes="(max-width: 391px) 100vw, 391px" class="wp-image-106032" /></noscript></span>

			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_14">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_20  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_14  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Abscess formation</strong>: A pus-filled abscess can form at the root, causing significant pain and swelling.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_15  et_pb_text_align_left  et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_blurb_content">
					<div class="et_pb_main_blurb_image"><span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><span class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone et-pb-icon"></span></span></div>
					<div class="et_pb_blurb_container">
						
						<div class="et_pb_blurb_description"><p><strong>Systemic infections</strong>: In rare cases, untreated dental infections can spread to other body parts, causing systemic health issues.</p></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_10 et_section_regular" >
				
				
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_15">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_21  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_heading et_pb_heading_5 et_pb_bg_layout_">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_heading_container"><h2 class="et_pb_module_heading">Dr. Jaydev’s Approach to Treating Root Canal Infections Years Later</h2></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_16">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_22  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_11  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>When a root canal infection recurs years after the initial procedure, it demands careful and effective treatment to prevent complications and preserve the tooth. Dr. Jaydev M, a seasoned dental surgeon, takes a comprehensive approach to these cases, drawing on his experience from thousands of root canal procedures.</p></div>
			</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_23  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_12  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><iframe loading="lazy" width="560" height="280" src="about:blank" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen="" data-rocket-lazyload="fitvidscompatible" data-lazy-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/b2-V82VyqW4?si=uxGgQVtg6v2EZfWR"></iframe><noscript><iframe width="560" height="280" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/b2-V82VyqW4?si=uxGgQVtg6v2EZfWR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen=""></iframe></noscript></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_17">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_24  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_13  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>The procedure starts with a thorough assessment using advanced diagnostic tools like digital imaging and 3D scans to identify the infection&#8217;s cause and extent. The affected tooth is carefully reopened, and the old filling is removed to access and clean the canals, eliminating bacteria and debris.</p></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_18">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_25  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_image et_pb_image_4">
				
				
				
				
				<span class="et_pb_image_wrap "><img decoding="async" width="722" height="280" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20722%20280'%3E%3C/svg%3E" alt="" title="6" data-lazy-srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/6-2.png.webp 722w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/6-2-480x186.png.webp 480w" data-lazy-sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 722px, 100vw" class="wp-image-106055" data-lazy-src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/6-2.png.webp" /><noscript><img decoding="async" width="722" height="280" src="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/6-2.png.webp" alt="" title="6" srcset="https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/6-2.png.webp 722w,https://drjaydevdental.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/6-2-480x186.png.webp 480w" sizes="(min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 480px) 480px, (min-width: 481px) 722px, 100vw" class="wp-image-106055" /></noscript></span>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_14  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>Dr. Jaydev may use specialized techniques to treat any hidden canals. After cleaning, the tooth is sealed with high-quality materials to prevent reinfection. Post-procedure care and follow-up appointments are crucial for a smooth recovery and optimal results.</p>
<p>At <a href="https://drjaydevdental.com/">Dr. Jaydev Dental Clinic</a>, every patient receives personalized care to ensure thorough and result-oriented treatment. Whether resealing the tooth or performing a root canal re-treatment, Dr. Jaydev offers the highest quality care for critical cases.</p></div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div>
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_11 et_section_regular" >

				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_15  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_text_align_center-phone et_pb_bg_layout_light">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p>If you need a professional and expert evaluation for your root canal-treated tooth, get in touch with a competent specialist today. Book an appointment now!</p></div>
			</div>

				<div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_20">
				<div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_28  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_module et_pb_heading et_pb_heading_6 et_pb_bg_layout_">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_heading_container"><h2 class="et_pb_module_heading">Frequently Asked Questions</h2></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_accordion et_pb_accordion_0">
				
				
				
				
				<div class="et_pb_toggle et_pb_module et_pb_accordion_item et_pb_accordion_item_0  et_pb_toggle_open">
				
				
				
				
				<h5 class="et_pb_toggle_title">What should I expect during a re-treatment for root canal infection?</h5>
				<div class="et_pb_toggle_content clearfix"><p>During re-treatment, the dentist will remove the old filling, clean the canals again, and address the infection. The procedure may involve additional steps, such as sealing the tooth to prevent infection.</p></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_toggle et_pb_module et_pb_accordion_item et_pb_accordion_item_1  et_pb_toggle_close">
				
				
				
				
				<h5 class="et_pb_toggle_title">How soon after re-treatment will I feel relief from symptoms?</h5>
				<div class="et_pb_toggle_content clearfix"><p>Most patients experience relief within a few days of the procedure. However, some may have mild discomfort for a short period, which typically subsides within a week.</p></div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_toggle et_pb_module et_pb_accordion_item et_pb_accordion_item_2  et_pb_toggle_close">
				
				
				
				
				<h5 class="et_pb_toggle_title">What makes Dr. Jaydev’s approach to root canal re-treatment unique?</h5>
				<div class="et_pb_toggle_content clearfix">Dr. Jaydev combines advanced diagnostic techniques and UK-trained expertise with cutting-edge approaches to offer precision in re-treatment. His focus on personalized care ensures effective resolution of even the most complicated cases.</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_toggle et_pb_module et_pb_accordion_item et_pb_accordion_item_3  et_pb_toggle_close">
				
				
				
				
				<h5 class="et_pb_toggle_title">How do I prevent root canal infections from recurring?</h5>
				<div class="et_pb_toggle_content clearfix">Maintaining good oral hygiene, avoiding excessive force on treated teeth, and following up with regular dental check-ups can help prevent re-infection and ensure the long-term success of root canal treatments.</div>
			</div><div class="et_pb_toggle et_pb_module et_pb_accordion_item et_pb_accordion_item_4  et_pb_toggle_close">
				
				
				
				
				<h5 class="et_pb_toggle_title">How effective is re-treatment for a root canal infection?</h5>
				<div class="et_pb_toggle_content clearfix">Re-treatment is highly effective, with success rates comparable to the initial procedure. If performed properly by an experienced professional, it can resolve the infection and restore the tooth.</div>
			</div>
			</div>
			</div>
				
				
				
				
			</div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_21">
